name: Rebel Racing
storyline:
Rebel Racing is an online mobile racing game developed and published by Hutch for iOS and Android. The game went through a soft launch in 10 territories before launching worldwide on November 11th, 2019.

Since its release, Rebel Racing has had frequent updates and new events running, adding cars, tracks, bosses, locations and quality of life features.

Rebel Racing has a story mode for players to race Boss' to progress through different Tiers and areas. Once all on-road Tiers are completed, players may purchase the Chevrolet K5 Blazer to access the off-road area or enter the weekly Head-to-Head or Ladder events to win cosmetic items, trophies, resources, augments, fusion credits, cash, gold and keys.

Players can buy cosmetic items for their vehicles using in game currencies or by winning them in events.
To unlock additional vehicles, players can beat the boss for a free car, race the boss for their car, purchase additional cars from the shop with in game currencies or with microtransactions.
Players can also find select vehicles within crates as Rebel Racing contains a loot box system. All crates can be purchased using Bronze, Silver or Gold Keys in the game. Crates can contain cars, cash, gold, keys and augments.
